thread.title: Zoetis Inc Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.16

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Zoetis Inc Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.16
text: Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Zoetis Inc Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.16 Reuters Staff Feb 15 (Reuters) - Zoetis Inc: * ZOETIS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.69 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.16 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 14 PERCENT TO $1.5 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.77 TO $2.93 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $5.675 BILLION TO $5.8 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.96 TO $3.10 * ADJUSTED NET INCOME FOR 2017 ‍EXCLUDES ONE-TIME PROVISIONAL NET TAX CHARGE OF $212 MILLION RELATED TO RECENTLY ENACTED TAX LEGISLATION IN U.S. ​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.66, REVENUE VIEW $1.40 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.98, REVENUE VIEW $5.61 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
